column2: Tanzania: Patiri imbere y'ubutungane yagirizwa vya mfura mbi yakoreye abana
column3: Umupatiri wa Ekleziya Katolika mu buraruko bwa Tanzania yarengukishijwe imbere y’ubutungane yagirizwa ivya mfura mbi yakoreye abana, nk’uko bivugwa n’igipolisi. Aba bana ni abanyeshure bo kuva mu mwaka wa gatandatu gushika mu mwaka wa mbere w’ishure ryisumbuye bariko bitegurira gusangira, abandi gukomezwa. Umunyamabanga mukuru w’Inama nkuru y’Abepiskopi muri Tanzania, Patiri Charles Kitima, avuga ko Ekleziya izokorana n’ababijejwe kugira ngo ubutungane bukore muri uru rubanza. Patiri Kitima ati: “Twavuze ko turindiriye iyo ngingo [ya sentare] kugira ngo izindi ngingo zifatwe...ivyemezo ni bitangwe hanyuma nawe ahabwe akaryo ko kwiregura, ico nico turindiriye. “Ni ngombwa ko amategeko akora igikorwa cayo kandi Ekleziya izokwifatanya n’ababijejwe kugira ngo abakorewe ikibi batunganirizwe”. Patiri Kitima yabwiye BBC ko muri rusangi Ekleziya Katorika irwanya ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina rikorerwa abana kuko isengero ritegerezwa kuba ikibanza c’amahoro kuri bose. Ati: “Reka twemere ko iki ari ikibazo kijanye na kamere ya nyene kubikora, dufise abapatiri barenga 3.000 muri kino gihugu ariko muri bo harimwo abo usanga bafise utunenge n’intege nke, ivyo bibaho”. Patiri Kitima avuga ko iki ari akabi kabishe kuko gituma abavyeyi n’abana bagira impungenge nyinshi, abana iyo bagiye mu bikorwa nk’ivyo baba bizeye ko bagiye guhura n’umuntu yari kubarera muri mutima. Ati: “Rero iyo bakorewe ibitabajanye ni ibintu bibabaza cane. “Twebwe nka Ekleziya turababazwa n’ingeso mbi z’umuntu umw’umwe ziteye kubiri kubiri n’ico twategerezwa kwubaka, kwubaka umuntu mu mico myiza. “Ureste ko iki ari igicumuro kandi kibabaza Imana, gifise n’ingaruka mbi ku bana, rero ni ngombwa ko hafatwa ingingo ruhasha”. Patiri Kitima avuga ko kw’isi abantu nk’abo bahari, ko rero dutegerezwa gufashanya nk’abanya muryango mu guhindura izo ngeso, kandi tugatanga inkuru iyo hari ikintu nk’iki kibaye. Avuga ko uburyo bwo gutanga inkuru muri Ekleziya butomoye, kuva hasi gushika hejuru ku Nama nkuru y’abepiskopi, abantu b’abahinga mu gutorera inyishu ibibazo nk’ivyo.

column2: Coronavirus: WHO isaba ibihugu vya Afrika kutajugunya incanco zataye igihe
column3: Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, risaba ibihugu vya Afrika kudaturira incanco za Covid-19 zishobora kuba zarataye igihe. Ibi bihugu vyasabwe kubangira bikarindira iyindi nzira nyayo. Aka kamo ka OMS kaje inyuma y'aho ibihugu vya Malawi na Sudani y'Epfo bitangarije ko bitegura guturira doze hafi 70.000 z'urucanco rwa Oxford-AstraZeneca kubera zataye igihe hagati muri uku kwa kane. Ariko ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe kurwanya indwara (Africa CDC) kivuga ko cari cijejwe ko izi ncanco ata ngorane zifise, zishobora gukoreshwa. Incanco nyinshi zirashobora gukoreshwa gushika ku mezi 36 (umwaka n'igice) kuva zihinguwe, ariko kubera ko izi za Covid-19 ari nshasha, nta vyemezo bikwiye bihari vyerekana ko zishobora kumara igihe kirekire zigifise inguvu. Ingingo ya nyuma izofatwa n'ibisata vy'ibihugu bijejwe kugenzura imiti. Igikorwa co gucandaga abantu mu kubakingira coronavirus muri Afrika kigenda bukebuke, ahanini kubera atazihari zikwiye hamwe n'abantu benshi bazifiseko amakenga. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ejo ku wa kane, John Nkengasong,  arongoye ikigo Africa CDC yavuze ati:  "Akamo ntera ibihugu vya Afrika ni aka: nimba uruhara rwacu ari ukurondera izi ncanco, namwe uruhara rwanyu ni uko mukoresha izi ncanco". Malawi ivuga ko itegura guturira doze zirenga 16.000 z'urucanco rwa AstraZeneca rwahinguwe na kompanyi y'Ubuhindi, Serum Institute of India (SII), kubera igihe cazo ntarengwa cari gushika ku wa 13 z'uku kwa kane. Ku ruhande rwayo, Sudani y'Epfo itegura guturira doze hafi 59.000 kuri iyo mvo nyene. Izi ncanco zari zahawe ibihugu 13 vya Afrika mu mugambi wo gufashanya hagati y'Umuryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika (UA) n'ikompanyi y'itumatumanako MTN , nk'uko bivugwa na Peter Mwai wo mu gisata Reality Check ca BBC. Umuryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika waguze umuriyoni wa doze za  AstraZeneca zari muri Afrika y'Epfo yari yahagaritse gutanga kubera amakenga ko zitari gukinga ubwoko bushasha bwa Covid-19 bwari burwiriye muri ico gihugu. Ikigo Africa CDC caciye kizirungika mu bihugu mu mpera z'ukwa gatatu, hasigaye indwi nkeya ngo zite igihe. Nkengasong yavuze ko ikompanyi Serum Institute of India (SII) yahanuye Africa CDC ko "izi ncanco zishobora kubandanya zikoreshwa mu kiringo c'amezi icenda inyuma y'itariki ntarengwa". Umukuru wa OMS mu karere ka Afrika, Matshidiso Moeti , asaba ibihugu "kubika neza izi ncanco mu gihe tukibandanya twiga twongera tugerageza kurondera kumenya nimba izi ncanco zishobora gukoreshwa mu kiringo kirekire". Uretse Malawi na Sudani y'Epfo, OMS ivuga ko Ghana na Sierra Leone navyo nyene bitakoresheje incanco zose kubera zari zataye igihe. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Sierra Leone avuga ko igihugu cari gisigaranye hafi ica gatatu ca doze cari cahawe. Austin Demby  yabwiye BBC ati:  "Twategerezwa gukora ibishoboka vyose tugakoresha izi ncanco". Ku bihugu 55 vya Afrika, 41 nivyo vyahawe incanco biciye mu mugambi mpuzamakungu Covax wo guhanahana izi ncanco. Hari ibindi indwi bikirindiriye kuronswa igice ca mbere. Umugambi wa Covax ufise intumbero yo gusaranganya incanco mu bihugu vyose ku rugero rungana, vyaba ibitunze canke ibikenye. Gushika ubu, doze zingana n'imiriyoni 38 nizo zimaze guhabwa ibihugu 98. Abahinga bavuga ko kugira ngo iki kiza karanda kirwanye ari uko incanco ziatangwa ku rugero rungana ku bihugu vyose kw'isi.

column2: Aba-Maasai TikTok yazaniye aba-fana ba Bollywood
column3: Mu mwambaro wabo uranga aba-Maasai kandi bakikijwe n'inka, abanya-Tanzania ba vuba mu kuba rurangiranwa kuri Tik Tok, abavukana Kili na Neema Paul, bariko bitegurira gufata video yabo ya vuba. Terefone ngendanwa igezweho yashinzwe ku nkingi imetero nkeya imbere y'inzu yabo muri Mindu Tulieni, ikigwati gito co mu ntara ya Pwani yo mu buseruko, Igisagara kiri hafi, Lugoba, kiri ku rugendo rw'isaha n'amaguru. Mu gihe ico kigwati ata muyagankuba gifise, Kili akigendera buri munsi kugira ashire umuriro muri terefone yiwe. Mu kwitegurira gufata iyo video , Kili, w'imyaka 26, ahagaze inyuma ya mushikiwe w'imyaka 23, Neema. Umuziki umaze gutangura kuvuga, Kili na mushikiwe baca bakurakuranwa mu kwigana  mu gi-Hindi bongera batamba  ku murindi w'izo ndirimbo zizwi cane muri  film/sinema za Bollywood [ingene bakubita iminwa bigahurirana neza neza n'amajambo y'iyo ndirimbo nk'uko womenga ijwi ni iryabo kandi humvikana iry'uwayiririmvye bwite; Lip sync). Mu mezi make aheze, izo video zabo zo gukubita iminwa zararabwe cane ku mbuga hwaniro mu Buhindi. Video yabo yamenyekanye cane, bigana  Raataan Lambiyan yo muri Shershaah , film y'uyu mwaka ya Bollywood, yarabwe incuro zirenga miriyoni imwe mu minsi mike gusa. Yakwiragijwe n'abakinyi bakuru muri iyo film Kiara Advani na Sidharth  Malhotra. Nyene kuririmba ubwa mbere iyo ndirimbo,  Jubin Nautiyal, yaratunguye abo bavukanyi igihe bagira ikiganiro c'ikibiriraho kuri imwe mu maradiyo yo mu Buhindi. Nautiyal yababwiye ati : "Bose barabazi  mu Buhindi. Muri rurangiranwa". Video bakoreye muri Mindu Tulieni, aho benshi badatunze terefone zigezweho, Kili na Neema ntibigeze bibaza ko zoshikiriye abantu baharurwa muri za miriyoni mu Buhindi no kw'isi nzima. Kili ati: "Tugitangura, vyari ibintu vyo kwiryohera gusa, ntitwigeze twibaza ko tuzomenyekana isi yose. "Maze gutangura kubona abantu bariko barayiraba n'ico bavuga mu Buhindi, naratangaye. Nararengewe." Icabatumye gukora izo video n'ugukunda film za Bollywood Kili yatanguye kuraba igihe yagenda mu mashure ku murwa mukuru , Dodoma. N'ubwo batari bazi urwo rurimi, we na mushikiwe bariyigishije kuririmba mu gi-Hindi. Kili avuga ati: "Kuva nkiri muto, nararaba ama film ya Bollywood mu ma cinema yo muri Tanzania nca ndakunda cane izo film n'indirimbo zirimwo. Iyo ukunda ikintu, biroroshe kuciga". "Binsaba iminsi mike yo kwiga amajambo y'indirimbo no kwimenyereza kuyisubiramwo. Ndarondera ico ayo majambo asigura mu congereza kugira menye uko ndayitamba neza." "N'imbere y'uko numva ico indirimbo ivuga, mba namaze kujana n'umuziki wayo." Kili yatanguye asubiramwo izo ndirimbo wenyene, mu nyuma azana mushikiwe nawe nyene asanzwe akunda film za  Bollywood. Neema avuga ati: "Igihe musazanje yansaba kugira video hamwe nawe, nabanje kwanka kuko nari mfise isoni zo kuja imbere ya camera." "Ariko mu nyuma ntangura kubimenyera. Ivy'abaye ni amayobera - ntitwigeze twibaza ko umunsi nk'uwo woshitse." Abo bavukana babiri, ubwa mbere bakuze baragira inka bakora no mu mirima, ubu umwanya bawumara batanga ibiganiro kuri television na radiyo zikomakomeye zo mu Buhindi. Ariko no mu gihugu cabo ca Tanzania, ubu baratanguye kumenyekana nka bamwe mu bazwi cane kuri Tik Tok. Konte izwi ya Kili kuri Tik Tok  ubu ifise miriyoni 1,8 y'abantu bamukurikira . Nta mwaka urakwira kuva atanguje iyo konte yiwe - amaze kumenya ivyerekeye Tik Tok abibwiwe n'abagenzi. Neema nawe aramaze kwuguruza konte yiwe kuri Instagram, ubu ikaba ifise abayikurikira bashika hafi 65.000. Ariko  mu gihe inkuru y'abo bavukana iriko irabica bigacika ku mbuga hwaniro hirya no hino kw'isi, mu muryango no mu babanyi ho basa n'uko ataco bazi kuba abana babo bariko baraba ba rurangiranwa. Kili avuga ati: "Abantu benshi ngaha ntibatunze terefone zigezweho kandi ntibazi ivyerekeye imbuga hwaniro. Na Neema nta vyinshi atahura. Biramuryohera gusa ariko ntazi ingaruka biriko biragira". "Nta muntu n'umwe yumva ivyari vyo igihe abanyamakuru batangura kuza mu kigwati iwacu bazanye n'ama-camera ya television. "Ubwa mbere umuryango wanje waguma wibaza igituma ndirimba  kandi ngatamba aho kuragira inka. "Ubu baratanguye gutahura ko ndiko ndakora ikintu ciza." Nta mafaranga barakura muri ivyo biyumviriye gukora, ariko vuba barashobora kuva mu buzima bwo mu kigwati bakaja gukina film/sinema. Ibinyamakuru vyo mu Buhindi bivuga ko baja bamaze gutangura kuronderwa cane  na Bollywood. Ni indoto zabaye ukuri kuri Kili  na Neema, bavuga ko kuva kera bamye bashaka gukora ivyo guteramisha abantu, ariko batigeze bibaza ko vyoshobotse. "Tuva mu kigwati gito hanze y'igisagara, nico gituma ntigeze nibaza ko indoto zanje zo kuba umukinyi w'ama-film no guhagarara imbere ya camera zobaye ukuri. Ivyo nabigumanye mu mutima wanje", ivyo bivugwa na Neema, we bitandukanye na musazawe,  atigeze ava muri Mundu Tulieni. "Amahirwe yo kuja mu Buhindi yoba ari igitangaza." Amakungu arorera, abo bavukana bavuga ko bafise ishaka ryo gutangura gukora izindi video zo guha ababakurikira. "Dushaka ko abantu baraba izi video bakaryoherwa, nico gituma twatanguye kuzikora." "Vyinshi biri mu nzira, abafana bacu rero ni bagume hafi." Priya Sippy n'umunyamakuru akorera uwubimusavye aba  London.

column2: Uganda: Uwigize umuhanuzi w'idini yakubise abayoboke yapfunzwe
column3: Umugabo wo muri Uganda yigize umuhanuzi w'idini yagirijwe ivyaha vyo guhohotera no gukora urudandaza rw'abantu. Umuhanuzi Kintu Dennis w’ishengero Hoima Empowerment Church International yabonetse muri video yarabwe cane ariko arakubita inkoni abayoboke b’ishengero ryiwe. Igipolisi cafashe uwo mugabo w’imyaka 42 kuwa gatatu w’ino ndwi ari kumwe n’abandi bayoboke b’iryo shengero bane nyuma y’aho iyo video yitwariwe. Afatwa amasanamu ariko arategeka abakozi bo mw’ishengero ngo baje imbere y’isengero bakubitwe canke bahebe kugaruka mu masengesho bace banatakaza amahirwe yo gukora kuri microphone yiwe. Ico gihe cose, abaje gusenga bagumye barorera mu gihe abo bakozi baza barakubitwa umwe inyuma y’uwundi hariko haravuga akaziki koroheje ka piano. Umuhanuzi Kintu yabariye abakora itohoza ko yariko arasubiramwo ivyo Yezu yakoze, igihe yasanga abantu bariko baradandariza mw’isengero, nk’uko biri mu rwandiko rw’igipolisi. Abajejwe intwaro kandi bavuga yuko yayobora iryo shengero atavyemerewe n’amategeko. Ugusaka kwakozwe m’iryo sengero kwatoye inkoni zitatu igipolisi kivuga yuko ari zo zakoreshwa mu gukubita abayoboke. Kintu Dennis yagumijwe mw’ibohera gushika itari indwi Nyakanga (9). Uganda ifise amashengero menshi ya gi-Kristu akorera hose mu gihugu. Ntagenzurwa kandi menshi muri yo atwarwa n’abagabo canke abagore biyita intumwa z’Imana.

column2: Umunyamakuru akaba n'umwanditsi kuri Afrika akomeye, Pierre Pean, yapfuye
column3: Pierre Pean, umuhinga kuri Afrika akaba yaranditse n'ibitabo vyinshi yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ejo kuwa kane afise imyaka 81. Nk'uko bivugwa n'igitangazamakuru co mu Bufaransa, France 24, umunyamakuru Pierre Pean, umukozi w'itohoza abushitse, yibanze cane kuri Afrika, n'ibitangazamakuru. Yibanze kandi ku banyepolitike - cane cane kahise katabonwa kumwe k'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu Francois Mitterrand mu gihe aba Nazi bari bacigaruriye Ubufaransa. Yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ejo tariki 25/07/2019 nk'uko umuryango wiwe wabitangarije ibiro ntaramakuru, AFP. Umuhungu wiwe w'umwanditsi Jean Gregor, yabwiye AFP ko Pierre Pean yahitanywe n'uburwayi ku bitaro vya Argenteuil mu karere ka Val-d'Oise. Ikinyamakuru co kuri internet, France Bleu, canditse ko Pierre Pean atakunda ko bamwita umunyamakuru w'itohoza. Mu matohoza yiwe yibanda ku kwerekana ukuntu ivyo atohoza canke abo atohozako bagoranye. Yavuze ko yaba ashaka gutohoza yidegemvya, ku bintu yihitiyemwo kandi ku gushaka kwiwe, ntabwirizwe canke ngo ajane narwo afatiye ku bivugwa mu bitangazamakuru canke imanza zo mu ma sentare. Yarandanitse ku Rwanda igitabo yise "Noir Fureur Blanc Menteur: Rwanda 1990-1994", igitabo kitashimwe n'ubutegetsi buriho mu Rwanda. Muri ico gitabo casohotse mu 2005, Pierre Pean ashira akabazo ku nkuru ya jenoside yo mu Rwanda ku buryo ivugwa n'ubutegetsi. Ku bw'ico gitabo, uwo mwanditsi yararezwe muri sentare n'ishirahamwe SOS Racisme, rimwagiriza "kugira uruhara mu gukwega urwanko rufatiye ku moko", kuko yanditse ko Abatutsi "bafise umuco w'ikinyoma no guhishahisha." Urwo rubanza yararutsinze.

column2: Burundi-CVR: 'Nimba ukuri ari ukuje gutera indyane mu gihugu, ntaco kwoba kumaze', Ndayishimiye
column3: Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko mu gihe "ukuri kwoza gutuma mu gihugu haduka indyane twopfuma tuguheba", yabivugiye mu kiganiro yahaye abanyagihugu kuri uyu wa gatatu, aho yasiguye yongera yishura ku bibazo bitari bike bijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu. Asigura ibijanye n'ukumenya ukuri ku bwicanyi bwabaye mu 1972-73, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko "kumenya ukuri atari ikibazo", ko ahubwo "kwodufasha kwubaka akahise kacu, abana bacu baze bamenye ikizira n'ikitazira". Ati: "Turi mu bihe vy'ukumenya ukuri, ariko rero, …ni kwaba uko kuri ari ukuje gutuma indyane ziba mu gihugu, uko kuri ntaco kwoba kumaze". Haciye imisi umurwi ujewe kumenya ukuri n'ukunywanisha mu Burundi,  CVR,   utangaje ko ubwicanyi bwabaye mu 1972-1973 ari "ihonyabwoko ryakorewe Abahutu", ivyateye impari mu Barundi bamwe bamwe, bavuga ko ico cegeranyo gifise aho gihengamiye canke ko bimwe mu bikivugwamwo ari "ikinyoma". Ku bwa Perezida Ndayishimiye, iyo ukuri kumaze kuboneka haba hasigaye ingene igihugu kigukoresha. Ati: "Mugabo rero hariho abandi baca basimba, bagaca barondera ingene bagukoresha, ivyo bijejwe inzego z'igihugu, zozo zizomenya ingene zigukoresha ziravye ico abenegihugu bazovuga". Yemerera Abarundi ko indongozi zizotegerezwa gukora uko zishoboye kwose "kugira ngo uko kuri kutwubake, kwubake kazoza k'Uburundi, gukure ivyo kwihorana". Akebura ko mu gihe ukuri kutamenyekanye bishobora gutuma ubwicanyi bubandanya. "Dutegerezwa kumenya ko kwica ari icaha gikomeye cane, hanyuma tukakirwaniriza hamwe. Rero uko kuri nti kuje kudusambura, kuje ahubwo kutwubaka". Ku bijanye n'ico cegeranyo ku bwicanyi bwa 1972-73, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko cashikirijwe inama nshingamateka, iyi nayo ikazogishikana mu rwego nshingwabikorwa rw'igihugu, na rwo ruheze rwiture abize amategeko kugira  bagice irya n'ino, kugira bemeze niba ari icaha mpuzamakungu n'abagikoze. Ku bafise ubwoba kuri iki cegeranyo, Perezida Evariste avuga ati: "Abarundi ni tuve mu bishobisho, nta bwoko bwagize jenoside mu Burundi, nta bwoko bwagize icaha c'ihonyabwoko mu Burundi". Ku bwa Perezida Ndayishimiye, bamwe mu Barundi bafise ubwoba kuko hamye ingeso yo kujaniranya, hakaba abitirira ikibi kanaka ubwoko kanaka "nk'uko umengo cari igihugu kitagira ubutegetsi". Evariste Ndayishimiye yemeza ko ubutegetsi bw'ico gihe ari bwo bubazwa ubu bwicanyi buteye impari. Ati: "Nta muntu n'umwe yonsigurira ingene hoba umurwi w'abantu wogenda ukagandagura abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, ntihagire ico ubutegetsi bukora ataco buwuziko". "Ni twemere neza ko ubutegetsi bw'igihugu bw'ico gihe bwamenje". Avuga ko bamwe mu bari muri bwo batanze ukuri barashinga intahe y'ukuntu vyagenze. Nayo ku bavuga ko ishirahamwe ONU ari ryo ryoba rifise ububasha bwo kwemeza icaha ca jenoside, Perezida Ndayishimiye avyamirira kure kuko "nta na hamwe vyanditse". "Igitabo mpanavyaha c'Uburundi, kirahana neza ivyaha vy'ihonyabwoko, amakungu si yo mucamanza w'Uburundi, ONU si reta y'Uburundi". "Icaha ca jenoside cemezwa n'amategeko mpanavyaha y'Uburundi". Abajijwe nimba abanyaporitike bahunze bagirizwa amabi bashobora kugirirwa ikigongwe, Perezida Ndayishimiye, avuga y'uko bizovana n'ingene igihugu gishobora kuvyakira. Ati: "Igihe Papa Johani Paulo wa kabiri bamurasa, uwamurashe yaramugiriye ikigongwe, mbere araja no kumuraba aho abohewe, ariko ntiyaciye ataha, igihugu nticaciye kimugirira ikigongwe. "Burya rero ibijanye n'ikigongwe, ubanza kuraba ingene igihugu kivyakira, nimba agatima k'ubukoko karavuye muri uyo muntu, kandi nimba ashobora gusubira mu bandi agatekana neza. "Mwarabonye abantu bagiriwe ikigongwe mu baheruka, ubwo nyene baca basubira kwica abantu, basubira gufatwa baja mu gasho. None nk'abo bantu wumva tutagize amakosa kubarekura?" Abajijwe ku bivugwa vy'uko urwego rujejwe igendereza ruhohotera abantu, mbere hakaba hari n'uwuherutse kuhasiga ubuzima, Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye nawe avuga ko uwabikoze yamenje kandi ko ategerezwa guhanwa. Avuga ko abakora ivyo bintu bashobora kuba bari muri ba bantu "baja gukora mu mabanga y'igihugu bafise inzigo", bafitiye akarigangamuhogo  abantu. Ati: "Muhora mwumva abapolisi bafata abantu bakabapfunga muri weekend kugira bazorekurwe ku wa mbere. Hariho Abarundi bagifise agakoko mu mitima". Mu misi iheze, hari umunywanyi w'umugambwe CNL yafashwe yagirijwe gutunga inkoho, arasinzikarizwa ubuzima gushika aritaba Imana. Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko yababajwe n'urupfu rwiwe, kandi ko uwabikoze yafashwe kugira ashiwe imbere y'ubutungane. "Uyo muntu yamuhohoteye yaramenje kandi ategerezwa guhanwa bimwe vy'akarorero. Ntituzokwihanganira na rimwe umuntu uwo ari we wese azohohotera uwundi, n'aho azoba yakoze ikibi, agateka kiwe kaguma kubahiriwa". Nayo ku kibazo c'abanyuruzwa, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko bikorwa n'akarwi k'inkozi z'ikibi kihaye kwama gatuntuza abarundi. Avuga ko bariko barahiga abagize ako karwi "kandi hari abamaze gufatwa muri bo, mbere dusanga harimwo n'umupolisi". Avuga ko abakora ubwo bubisha ari ababá bashaka kwerekana ko ubutegetsi bw'igihugu ari bwo bunyuruza abantu. Ati: "Nico gituma ubona baca bahindukiza, ngo ni uburongozi bw'igihugu. None Uburongozi bw'igihugu bwoba ari bwo bwabikoze bugaca buja guhiga abo bantu?"

column2: DR Congo: Inama nshingamateka yabogoje umukuru wayo asanzwe acuditse na Kabila
column3: Inama nshingamateka ya Repubulika y'Intwaro rusangi ya Congo yemeje ko umukuru wayo abogozwa. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho inama nshingamateka isohoreye urwandiko rwo kwiyamiriza uyu mukuru w'inama nshingamateka, Jeanine Mabunda, asanzwe acuditse cane na Josepf Kabila, hamwe n'abo bakorana, bakagirizwa uburongozi bubi. Iyi ni intsinzi kuri Perezida Félix Tshisekedi amaze igihe atumvikana n'uwo yasubiriye, Perezida Kabila. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, haradutse akaguma mu nama nshingamateka, biba ngombwa ko igipolisi kiza kubanguranya abari bashamiranye. Jeanine Mabunda, umukuru w'iyi nama nshingamateka, ni akadasohoka na Josepf Kabila, akaba yabogojwe n'amajwi 281 kuri 200. Niwe mukenyezi wa mbere yari yizigiwe ngo arongore inama nshingamateka ya Congo, ariko mu nyuma ico cizere bari bamuhaye kikaba cagiye gisubira inyuma. Abashingamateka begamiye ku ruhande rwa Perezida Tshisekedi bamwagiriza ko ahengamira ku ruhande rwa Kabila mu ngingo ziwe, arico gituma yabogojwe. Wewe arahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Aya matora yatumye abashingamateka benshi baja ku ruhande rwa Perezida Tshisekedi. Ubu rero, ni akanya keza kuri we ko gushira mu ngiro imigambi yatangaje ku wa Mungu uheze, harimwo gushinga reta nshasha avuga ko yomworohereza gukorera bikwiye abanyagihugu ba Congo. Iri bogozwa ry'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ni uruhombo rudasanzwe kuri Perezida Kabila, yashikirije ubutegetsi mu mwaka uheze inyuma y'imyaka 18 arongoye iki gihugu. Hagti aho, n'aho yari yashikirije ubutegetsi amaze gutsindwa mu matora, yagumanye ibibanza vyinshi mu nama nshingamateka y'igihugu, co kimwe no mu nama nshingamateka z'uburere.

column2: Ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia burabangamiwe n'intambara ya Tigray
column3: Intambara y'imbere muri Ethiopia imaze amezi 10, imaze guhitana abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, abaharurwa muri za miriyoni barata izabo abandi na bo bari mu kaga  aho bakeneye imfashanyo. Ariko ivyo si vyo vyonyene imaze kwonona ku gihugu kiza ubugira kabiri mu kubamwo abantu benshi muri Afrika - intambara imaze kwonona vyinshi no mu butunzi, bishobora gufata imyaka n'iyindi kugira bisanurwe. Ku mugwa mukuru Addis - Ababa, Tigist w'imyaka 26, atashimye ko amazina yiwe yose akoreshwa, avuga ko amafaranga akoresha ku kwezi ku kwezi ubu yigwije na kabiri kubera imvo zibiri: intambara yadutse muri Tigray mu kwezi kwa cumi  na rimwe hamwe n'ikiza ca coronavirus. Avuga ati: "Imbere y'intambara na Covid, nakoresha birr 1.000 (nk'ama dorari 22) buri kwezi mu gusuma ivyo guteka. Ubu nkoresha birr 2.000". "Ubu ibintu birazimvye gusumba, terefone, impuzu, ivyo kurya." Ibiharuro vyo kugereranya bitangwa n'inzego za reta vyerekana ko ibiciro vy'ivyankenerwa koko vyaduze  muri Ethiopia - muri rusangi mu kwezi kw'indwi vyari  ica kane hejuru y'uko vyari bimeze nk'ico gihe nyene mu mwaka uheze. Tigist akora mw'isoko-duka (supermarket) kugira ashobore gufasha umuryango. Wewe ajejwe gusuma ivyo kurya, musazawe nawe akariha inzu. Avuga kandi ko ''kuvunja idorari na vyo bitameze neza. Mu mwaka uheze, kw'idorari rimwe ($1)  waronka birr 35, ubu uronka 45." Faisal Roble, umuhinga  ari muri Amerika yihweza ibintu n'ibindi na cane cane ivyo mu karere k'ihembe rya Afrika, avuga ko gukoresha amafaranga mu bikorwa vy'intambara bigira "ingaruka mbi ku bushobozi bwa Ethiopia bwo gushikira ama dorari ''  bigatuma kandi urugero rwo kuvunja rutituka. Ntibizwi amafaranga yose intambara imaze gutwara uko angana ariko ikigo citwa Trading Economics kigereranya ko amafaranga aja mu vya gisirikare azoshika kuri miriyoni 502 z'ama dorari gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka, mu gihe zari miriyoni  460 mu mwaka uheze. Mu   ndwi iheze umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU Antonio Guterres yavuze ko iyo ntanbara imaze gutwara igihugu umuriyaridi w'ama dorari. Imbere y'intambara n'ikiza ca coronavirus, ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia bwari mu bunyaruka kwiyongera cane mu karere, bwaduga muri rusangi ku rugero rwa 10% ku mwaka mu myaka 10 yo gushika mu 2019, nk'uko bigereranywa na banki y'isi (Banque Mondiale). Mu gihe Tigist avuga urugero rwo kuvunja muri banki, Roble avuga ko birr (ifaranga rya Ethiopia) kw'isoko isanzwe ho ryakorotse gusumba, ubu idorari rimwe rikaba rivunjwa birr  67. Avuga ko abagwizatunga muri ico gihugu ubu imitsi yama yaranze kubera ikibazo c'umutekano mu gihe intambara ubu yarenze imbibe za Tigray ikaba igeze mu ntara bihana imbibe za Afar na Amhara. Intambara yatanguye igihe umugambwe wahora utwara intara ya Tigray, Tigray  People's Liberation Front (TPLF) watera amakambi ya gisirikare mu kwezi kwa 11, biturutse ku kutumvikana ku bibazo vya poritike n'umushikiranganji wa mbere, Abiy Ahmed. Kuva ico gihe, ingabo za Ethiopia - hamwe n'ingabo za Eritrea zibashigikiye, bafatanije n'igipolisi n'utundi tugwi tugendana ibigwanisho, baciye batangura intambara imaze gusesa amaraso menshi, yo kugwanya TPLF. Impande zompi zimaze kwagirizwa gukora amahano, harimwo gusambanya ku nguvu no kwica  ikivunga abanyagihugu basanzwe. Intara ya Tigray nta vyankenerwa ikironka, harimwo uburyo bwo gutumatumanako hamwe na banki, kuva reta ya Ethiopia ifashe ingingo yo kwugarana iyo ntara mu kwezi kwa gatandatu, inyuma y'aho abagwanyi ba Tigray bigaruriye umugwa mukuru Mekelle. Abantu 400.000 muri Tigray ubu babayeho nk'abugarijwe n'inzara mu gihe  kubashikiriza imfashanyo bigorana cane, umuyagankuba n'ibitoro na vyo bikaba biboneka nabi nabi bigatuma ibiciro biduga. Filmon Berhane aba muri Mekelle yabwiye BBC mu rurimi rw'igi-Tigrinya ko ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya n'amazu muri iyi minsi vyaduze cane. Yavuze ati: "Nta mafaranga ahari  kuko amabanki yose arugaye, muri reta na ho ntibagitanga imishashara". Mu makungu, iyo ntambara yagize ingaruka kw'izina rya Ethiopia nk'igihugu co kujanamwo imitahe nk'uko bivugwa na Irgard Erasamus wo mu kigo ca NKC African Economics. Madame  Erasmus afatira akarorero nko ku gisata c'amaterefone co muri Ethiopia caheruka gushirwa kw'isoko y'abikorera ku giti cabo, aho cari cakweze abanyamitahe benshi barimwo abo muri Afrika y'Epfo nk'igihangange MTN. Ariko amaherezo kompanyi imwe gusa ni yo yahavuye ihiganirwa rumwe mu mpusha zibiri zari zashizwe kw'isoko, n'urufatanye rw'amakompanyi rurongowe na Safaricom yo muri Kenya ku mafaranga angana na miriyoni 850 y'amadorari. Abahinga bavuga ko intambara ya Tigray yatumye abanyamitahe bacika intege. Ukwiyongera kw'ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia muri rusangi uyu mwaka kugereranywa ko kuzogabanuka cane kuva kuri 6% mu 2020 gushika ku 2% mu 2021 - urugero rwa mbere rwo hasi mu myaka hafi 20, ku bw'ikigega mpuzamakungu FMI. Igihugu kigurira hanze ibintu biciye miriyaridi 14 z'amadorari ku mwaka, mu gihe kigurisha ibiciye  imiriyaridi 3,4 z'ama dorari. Hari n'amakenga ku kwiyongera kw'ideni rya reta ya Ethiopia mu gihugu hagati, aho hari abagereranya ko rizoshika ku miriyaridi 60 z'ama dorari uyu mwaka, hafi y'ibice 70% y'umwimbu rusangi wo muri ico gihugu. Mu gihe Amerika yafatiye ingingo zimwe zimwe zerekeye impusha zo kuja muri ico gihugu abanye Ethiopia bafise uruhara muri iyo ntambara, kandi ikanahagarika zimwe zimwe mu mfashanyo yaha Ethiopia, gushika ubu amakungu yirinze kuremera cane reta ku bijanye n'ubutunzi, canke ngo ahagarike imigambi y'imfashanyo y'ubutunzi,  hafi ica kane c'abanyagihugu babayeho musi y'urugero rw'ubukene, na yo muri rusangi umwimbu w'umunyagihugu ungana n'amadorari 850 ku mwaka.

column2: Umupfasoni Claudette avuga ko arenza 200kg ari mu maganya kubera ubuvyibuhe
column3: Mu buzima busanzwe kuri we, Claudette Nyirangendo avuga ko ari nk'ukwurira umusozi buri musi, ibi bikavana n'ukwiremera kubera ubuvyibuhe burenze urugero ubu bwahagaritse ibikorwa biboneka ko ari ibisanzwe kuri buri muntu ariko kuri we bikaba amagorwa. Ntaherutse kwipimisha uburemere ariko ubu yibaza ko arenza ibiro 200. Ku myaka 43, uyu mupfasoni abaye mu maganya akavuga ko yipfuza kubona uburemere bw'umubiri wiwe bugabanutse. Claudette ati: "Ubuzima burandemereye cane, rimwe rimwe ndashobora kumara n'imisi ibiri canke itatu ntavuye mu gitanda, kubera ingorane zo gutambuka bivanye n'uko niremereye". Uyu munyarwandakazi Claudette arasigura ingene yari abayeho neza mu bwana bwiwe  n'igihe yari akiri umuyabaga. Yibuka ko ico gihe atari avyibushe uko avyibushe ubu. Avuga ko atazi igituma yavyibushe birenze urugero mu myaka itandatu iheze mu gihe afungura indya kama zo mu gihugu ciwe zisanzwe ziribwa n'abandi, nk'akarorero ibitoke n'imboga. Ubu buvyibuhe bwamuteye ibibazo vyinshi na cane cane iyo yibutse ko kimwe mu vyamutumye yahukana gifitaniye isano n'ubuvyibuhe bwiwe burenze urugero. Uyu mupfasoni avuga ko umugabo wiwe yaruhishijwe no kubandanya abana nawe kubera uburemere bwiwe, akavuga ko yama avyidoga igihe cose bamaranye bubakanye. Ati: "Jewe nari umuvyeyi n'umukenyezi mwiza, ariko ndibaza ko atashoboye kwihanganira ubuvyibuhe bwanje, bituma anta aca yigira kwiberaho ukwiwe. Ubu rero, mbeshejweho gusa n'umukobwa wanje amfasha ikintu ico ari co cose kuko ata bushobozi mfise bwo kwunama". Uyu mukenyezi avuga ko yari yubakanye n'umugabo wa mbere bamaranye imyaka itari mike ariko akavamwo apfa akamusiga ari umupfakazi areze abana bane. Inyuma y'aho, yakundanye n'uwundi mugabo birangira barongoranye, bakaba bavyaranye umwana umwe imbere y'uko amuheba. Ubu aho ari, abanye n'uyu mwana wiwe akavuga ko abayeho mu buzima bugoye cane. Iyindi ngorane nini ni uko gutembera kuri we ari ikibazo gikomeye. Aho asanzwe aba, utuzu twa surwumwe turi hanze kandi ni duto cane ku buryo adashobora kwinjira kubera ubuvyibuhe bwiwe, ibi bikunyurwa n'uko adashobora no kwunama. Claudette ati: "Mfise umubabaro mwinshi cane kubona ubuvyibuhe bwanje bwanshikanye aho ntashoboye no kwifasha mu bintu vyanje vyihariye, aho no kwihagarika nkenera uwumfasha, aha nkavuga umukobwa wanje amfasha vyose kubera ntashobora gushika kuri karya kazu ka surwumwe, sinokwirwa mu muryango kandi uburemere bwanje ntibunyemerera kwunama". Hampande y'ibi, uyu mugore avuga ko kugirira isuku umubiri wiwe kenshi ari ingorane. Hari igihe vyanka ko ashika mu bwogero akenshi bikaba ngombwa ko yihanagura gusa. Muri kino gihe, ariko ararondera uburyo butandukanye kugira ngo atangure kugabanya ubuvyibuhe. Avuga ko ibikorwa vyinshi bimusaba ko aba ari hanze vyahagaze, akaba atazi ico yokora. Umwikomo niwo uranga ubuzima bwiwe kubera yama ariko yiyumvira ubuvyibuhe bwiwe, akicwa n'irungu ryo kwama yicaye muhira imisi yose adashobora gutembera canke guhagarara umwanya muremure. Hagati aho, Claudette aracafise icizere ko azohava atora inyishu y'ukungene yogabanya ubuvyibuhe. Nk'uko bivugwa n'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi n'imbuga ngurukanabumenyi zitandukanye zivuga ibijanye n'amagara, ubuvyibuhe burenze urugero buvana n'amavuta arenze aguma yiyongera mu mubiri gushika ku rugero rwo kwonona amagara y'umuntu. Kugira ngo umuntu avugwe ko avyibushe kandi aremereye birenze urugero, bafatira ku burebure bw'umuntu n'uburemere afise. Abahinga mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu bavuga ko ubuvyibuhe burenze urugero ari bubi cane ku magara y'umuntu kandi ko bushobora gutuma yandura indwara canke zikiyongera, harimwo  umuvuduko w'amaraso, indwara z'umutima n'ibibazo vyo guhema. Ubuvyibuhe burenze urugero akenshi burava ku bintu bitandukanye harimwo gufungura indya zirimwo isukari nyinshi (glucoses). Kutagira imyimenyerezo ngororamubiri hamwe n'uduce ndangakamere mvukanwa twihariye, hakaba n'abandi bake baba bafise uduce ndangakamere hamwe n'imisemburo canke inkabuzo bidakora neza. Bavuga ko gufungura neza n'imyimenyerezo ngororamubiri ari nzo nzira nkuru zo gutorera umuti ubuvyibuhe burenze urugero.

column2: Yegereyegere "Kwa Siyoni": Abajejwe iryo soko ntibavuga rumwe n'abarikoreramwo
column3: Abadandariza mw'isoko rya Bujumbura City Market rizwi nko kwa Siyoni barahagaritse ibikorwa vyabo kuva kuri uyu wa kabiri biyamiriza iduzwa ry'amahera yo kuriha ibibanza bakoreramwo  gushika ku ncuro zibiri. Ariko abajejwe iryo soko, bavuga yuko ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe uravye ibihe tugezemwo n'uburyo bwakoreshejwe mu kuvugurura isoko. Umupfasoni umwe muri abo badandaza bavuganye na BBC atashimye kwivuga izina, avuga ko bandikiwe amakete abamenyesha ko kuva itariki 10 z'ukwezi kwa mbere 2022 amahera bahora bariha yadugijwe incuro zibiri. Agira ati: "Batumenyesheje ko kubera ibikorwa vyakozwe muri iryo soko, ko kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere amahera twahora turiha azohinduka. Akarorero abahora bariha ibihumbi 400 ku kwezi bazoriha ibihumbi 750, abahora bariha na bo 188.800 bakazoriha 312.000. Urumva ko bagwijije incuro zibiri zirenga." Ivyo bikorwa bivugwa vyakozwe ngo ni nko kwubaka ahahagarara imiduga, gusiga isima hasi hamwe n'amabombo (robine) azana amazi mu ntumbero yo kwikingira ikiza Covid-19. Abadandariza muri  iyo soko bavuga ko batanka ko ibiciro vyoduga, ariko bagasaba ko habanza kuba inama n'ingingo. BBC yashoboye kuvugana n'uburongozi bw'iryo soko, uwitwa Joseph Dukundane atubwira yuko baravye igihe cari kihaciye amahera ataduzwa kandi ibintu vyarazimvye, hamwe n'ibikorwa vyo kuvugurura isoko baranguye, ngo ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe: Kanda ngaha wumve ico kiganiro.

column2: Zelensky arishimira ‘inkuru nziza’ inyuma yo kwisubiza uturere twari twigaruriwe n’Uburusiya
column3: Perezida Volodymyr Ukraine wa Ukraine avuga ko afise “agakuru keza” ko bigaruriye uturere tutari duke twari mu minwe y’ingabo z‘Uburusiya. Hari ibihuha vyari bimaze imisi bivuga ko bishoboka ko hari intambwe yatewe mu buseruko bwa Kharkiv, ariko abategetsi ba Ukraine bakaba ataco bari bwashikirize. Perezida Zelensky ntiyashatse kudoma urutoke ku turere twigaruriwe, akavuga ati “ubu si igihe co kuvuga amazina” yatwo. Abategetsi ba Amerika bavuga ko Ukraine iriko iratera intambwe bukebuke ariko ikomeye mu rugamba rwo kurwanya ingabo z’Uburusiya. Mw’ijambo ryiwe yashikirije abanya-Ukraine abicishije kuri videwo nijoro,  Zelensky yavuze ko hari “amakuru meza” ku vyerekeye ibihuha bivuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zateye intambwe. Ashimagiza ingabo n’ubutwari bwazo ku rugamba, avuga ati: "Ndibaza ko buri munyagihugu yishimira ingabo zacu”. Ariko, yongerako ati: "Ubu si igihe co kuvuga amazina y’utu turere twasubiye kuduza ibendera rya Ukraine”. Ukraine yarakomeje ibikorwa vyayo vy’umutekano mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, ariko igatanga amakuru make ku vyerekeye ibikorwa vyo kwivuna vyari birindiriwe mu buseruko no mu bumanuko. Ingabo za Ukraine zaratanguje urugamba mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Kharkiv, amaja mu ntara ya Donetsk iri mu buseruko, igenzurwa bikomeye n’igisirikare c’Uburusiya kuva intambara itanguye, haraciye amezi atandatu. Hari amakuru avuga ko ingabo za Ukraine zoba ziri hafi y’igisagara ca Izyum, igisagara ngirakamaro mu gushikana ibikoresho ku ngabo z’Uburusiya. Mw’ijambo yashikirije mu birori muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Colin Kahl – icegera c’umunyamabanga ajejwe imigambi yo kwivuna abansi – yavuze ko ingabo za Ukraine ziriko ziravyitwaramwo neza gusumba iz’Uburusiya mu turere tumwe tumwe. Yasubiwemwo n’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru Reuters  avuga ati: "Haracari kare. Nibaza ko abanya-Ukraine bariko batera intambwe bukebuke ariko ikomeye. Tuzoraba ingene bizogenda. "Ariko ndibaza neza ko ibintu biriko bigenda neza ku ruhande rwa Ukraine muri kino gihe mu bumanuko gusumba uko bimeze ku ruhande rw’Uburusiya”. Hagati aho, ibintu biracameze nabi. Igihe vyariko bitanga amakuru y’ingene ibintu vyifashe mw’ijoro ry’ejo ku wa gatatu, ibiro bikuru vya gisirikare vya Ukraine vyavuze ko igisirikare cabo; “Casubije inyuma ibitero vyose vy’Uburusiya” mu ntara za Kharkiv na Donetsk – ariko ko impande zompi zibandanya ziterana vya muzinga n’ibitero vy’indege, ibibanza bitari bike bikaba bihononekarira. Ejo ku wa gatatu, Perezida Zelensky yavuze kandi ko amafaranga reta ya Ukraine izokoresha mu mwaka uza azoba ari ay’igihugu kiri mu ntambara – aho imiriyaridi 27 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika azoshirwa mu gisata co kwivuna abansi. Ariko yemeye ko ivya nkenerwa mu mibereho y’abanyagihugu, nk’agafashanyo ko mu za bukuru bizobandanya bitangwa. Hagati aho, agabisha ati: "Ni nkenerwa kugabanya mu buryo bwose bushoboka ibintu bidakenewe cane, ibintu vyose bidafasha mu kwivuna umwansi, bidafasha mw’iterambere ry’ubutunzi bw’igihugu cacu, mu mubereho n’akaranga vy’abanyagihugu bacu." Abihweza ibintu n’ibindi muri Amerika no mw’ishirahamwe ONU berekanye amakenga yabo kuri kazoza k’abasivire muri Ukraine mu gihe intambara ibandanya. Umutegetsi mukuru wo mu gisata kijejwe agateka ka muntu mw’ishirahamwe ONU avuga ko iri shirahamwe rifise impungenge ku bantu bata izabo muri Ukraine – cane cane kazoza k’abana. Ilze Brands Kehris, icegera c’umunyamabanga mukuru w’ishami rijejwe agateka ka muntu, avuga ati: "Hari amakuru yo kwizera avuga abana batwarwa ku nguvu batari kumwe n’abavyeyi babo mu karere kigaruriwe n’Abarusiya, canke mu Burusiya bwo nyene”. Ishirahamwe ryiwe rifise amakenga ko Uburusiya bwashinze “uburyo bworoshe” bwo guha abo bana ubwenegihugu bw’Uburusiya, mbere bukabashira mu minwe y’imiryango y’Abarusiya kugira babe ari bo babarera, nk’uko abivuga. Abona ko iyi ngendo ishobora guhonyanga amasezerano ya Geneva. Eka na Amerika ifise amakenga nk’aya nyene, aho ejo ku wa gatatu yavuze ko hari abanya-Ukraine, ariko bakuze, batwarwa ku nguvu. Ibiro vy’ubunyamabanga bujejwe imigenderanire bwagiriza Kremlin ko ifise urutonde rw’abanya-Ukraine bategerezwa gutwarwa ku nguvu mu turere tw’igihugu turi mu minwe y’Uburusiya.

column2: Umupasitori aregwa gusambanya umukenyezi ku nguvu muri Nigeria yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yo kurongora ishengero.
column3: Uyo mupastori asayangana , Biodun Fatoyinbo yari amaze imisi avugwa mu makuru iyi misi itatu iheze, inyuma yaho umukenyezi azwi cane mu gufata amafoto amwagiririje ko yamusambanije ku nguvu incuro zibiri imbere y'uko ashikana imyaka cumi n'umunani, haheze imyaka irenga cumi. Uyo mu pastori w'ishengero bita COZA rikundwa cane mu gisagara Abuja yanditse ku rubuga ngurukana bumenyi rwa Instagram kuri uyu musi wa mbere  ko yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera iyo nkuru yavuzwe cane. Hari abari bakoze  imyiyerekano mu mpera z'iyindwi mu bisagara bikuru bibiri vy'igihugu ca Nigeria arivyo Lagos na  Abuja. Basabira  ubutungane Busola Dakolo inyuma yaho amasanamu y'uwo mukenyezi  akwiragirijwe cane  ku mbuga  ngurukana bumenyi , avuga ko uyo mupastori yamusambanije ku nguvu. Uyo mu pastori wewe arabihakana. Igipolisi camenyesheje ko kitaramenya ibirego umukenyezi Dakolo yagirije uyo mu pastori  kandi ko ata muntu n'umwe arashikana ibirego nk'ivyo imbere y'ababijejwe. Igihugu ca Nigeria gifise abapastori benshi b'amasengero yemera Kristu y'abapentekoti, bamwe mu bapastori bakunze kwagirizwa kugira  inyifato itabereye.

column2: Abarundi babiri bakomeretse mu gitero ca grenade mw'ikambi y'impunzi muri Malawi
column3: Abantu batanu, harimwo Abarundi babiri, nibo bakomerekeye mu gitero c’igisasu ntezwantoke (grenade) cabereye mw’ikambi y’impunzi ya Dzaleka muri Malawi, nk’uko bitangazwa n’igipolisi c’ico gihugu. Iki gitero cabaye ku wa gatatu kw’isaha imwe z’ijoro kw’isoko nkuru y’iyo kambi, nk’uko bimenyeshwa n’igipolisi, kikavuga kandi ko cahagaritse impunzi y’umunyarwanda yikekwa ko ari we yakoze ico gitero n’ibigirankana. “Barabonye umuntu yakije umwampi imbere y’uko atera ikintu ciketswe ko yari grenade”, niko Gladson M'bumpha, umuvugizi w’igipolisi mu karere ka Dowa yabwiye BBC. M'bumpha avuga ko muri aba batanu bakomeretse harimwo Butoyi Fideli arongoye impunzi z’Abarundi muri iyo kambi, hamwe kandi na Bruno Ndayishime, umunyamabanga wiwe. Avuga ko muri kino gihe bataramenya imvo yatumye uyu muntu atera iyi grenade, ariko ko uwiketswe ariko arabazwa. Gladson M'bumpha avuga ko iyo kambi  irwiriyemwo impunzi “z’Abarundi, Abanyarwanda n’Abakongomani”, ariko ko harimwo n’izindi ziva mu bihugu bitandukanye nka Tanzania na Somalia. Avuga ko iki ari co gitero ca mbere kibaye muri ino kambi yo mu karere ka Dowa, kandi ko igipolisi kiriko kirakora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo kimenye uwagirizwa igituma yateye grenade abo bantu. Ati: “Iki ni ikintu catumye igipolisi kimera magabo kuko impunzi ntizemerewe gutunga ibirwanisho nk’ibi bicira umuriro”. Avuga ko iyo kambi yari isanzwe itekanye imbere y’uko iki gitero kiba. Umwe mu barundikazi barongoye abandi muri iyo kambi atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana, yabwiye BBC ko impunzi muri iyo kambi zifise ubwoba kuko ari ikintu kitari bwigere kibaho kuva iyo kambi itanguye. Ati: “Ni ikintu caduteye ubwoba kuko cadushikiye giturumbuka kandi tudashobora gutahura ingene cashitse, ikintu tutari tumenyereye kubona mu nkambi y’impunzi mu myaka ishika 30 imaze”. Avuga ko, n’aho uwikekwa gukora ico gitero ari impunzi y’umunyarwanda, “tubanye neza nta kibazo dufitaniye n’abanyarwanda turi kumwe mu nkambi”. Hagati aho, uyu mupfasoni avuga ko bafise ubwoba ko reta ya Malawi ishobora kubafatira ingingo zitabashimisha. Ati: “Tubaye mugihugu nk’abashitsi, si igihugu cacu, barashobora kutwiyumvira ukundi kuntu, bakerekana ko kumbure turi abicanyi, canke ibindi”. Asaba reta gukora amatohoza yimbitse kugira ngo bamenye intandaro y’ico kibi maze bashobore guhumurizwa. Abajijwe nimba ata mugambi bafise wo guhunguka nk’uko reta y’Uburundi ibatera akamo, uyo mupfasoni avuga ati: “Reta ni reta nyene kandi ivuga nka reta, umwe wese afise ivyo yagiye ahunga bitandukanye n’ivyo uwundi. “Umwe wese ashobora kuvuga ati jewe aho navuye nshobora kuhasubira nta kibazo, uwundi nawe ati jewe sinohasubira kuko mfise ibibazo. “Rero ako kamo reta itera, iragatera ariko kitabirwa n’uwubikeneye, kuko buri muntu wese afise ibibazo vyiwe vyatumye ahunga”.

column2: Christine Ntahe: Menya uyu murundikazi yahawe agashimwe ka Kenn Allen Global Award
column3: Umupfasoni Christine Ntahe w'umurundikazi yahawe agashimwe mpuzamakungu ku bikorwa vyiwe vyo kwitangira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu cane cane mu kwitaho abana bo mw'ibarabara. Ni agashimwe ahawe nk'umukorerabushake n'ishirahamwe International Association for Volunteer Effort kitiriwe Kenn Allen Global Award kaje kwiyongera ku bundi butari buke amaze kuronka kubera ibi bikorwa vyiwe amazemwo imyaka irenga 25. Christine Ntahe, Maman Dimanche nk'uko azwi cane i Bujumbura no mu gihugu, yabwiye BBC ko yatanguye gufasha abana bo mw'ibarabara mu 1994, igihe igihugu cari mu ndyane z'amoko zatanguye inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye mu 1993. Ati: "Naciye ngerageza kuba hafi y'abana bo mw'ibarabara, mvuga nti nta mwana ategerezwa kuba mw'ibarabara, ibarabara ntirirera. Ntangura kubaba hafi igihe amasasu yari menshi mu gisagara ca Bujumbura no mu gihugu cose, jewe nkaba nahambije abana bo mw'ibarabara bo mu gisagara". Mu mwaka wa 2000, umupfasoni Ntahe yashinze ishirahamwe Bon Geste ryo gufasha abana ba ntahonikora uhereye ku bana bo mw'ibarabara, impfuvyi n'abandi ba ntahonikora mu Burundi, igihugu cagiye gica mu ndyane zatumye biyongera. Umupfasoni Ntahe avuga ko yatanguriye ku bana cumi bo mw'ibarabara, ubu akaba amaze kuramura abatari bake, mbere bamwe muri bo bahejeje amakaminuza, abandi bakaba baciga. Avuga ko bitamworoheye kubera ibibazo vy'amoko vyari bihanze igihugu ico gihe kuko wewe yakira uwo ari we wese ataravye amamuko yiwe. Ati: "Ndibuka ca gihe Uburundi bwari mu bihano, nahora ngenda kubatora n'amaguru hariya kuri Place de l'Indépendance [ikibanza citiriwe ukwikukira], tukaza n'amaguru, hari henshi twaca bakadutera amabuye, ntitwari tuzi abo ari bo". Ntahe avuga ko impande zompi zamurwanya kuko ata ruhande na rumwe rwemera ivyo akora. Ati: "Irya ntambara yari iy'ubwoko hagati y'Abahutu n'Abatutsi. Hariho Abahutu bamwe bamwe bambwira bati ntitukwemera kuko ntamututsikazi n'umwe ashobora gukorera iciza umuhutu ataco ariko ararondera. "Abatutsi nabo bamwe bamwe bakambwira bati 'umviriza, ivyo ukora vyose wiruka inyuma y'abo bana b'Abahutu, nibo bazoza kugukata umutwe'. "Jewe rero nta hantu na hamwe nari mpagaze, uretse guhagararira ukuri, urukundo n'ugukorera Imana kuko nabona ko abana bariko bazira ubusa". Ni ivyo bikorwa vyiwe vyo kwitangira abana vyamuhaye iritazirano rya "Maman Dimanche" rizwi cane i Bujumbura, avuga ko yahawe n'abo bana nyene asanzwe afasha. Avuga ko muri kino gihe afise abana bashika amajana abiri yama afungurira imisi yose muhira iwe. Kuva atanguye iki gikorwa, amaze kuramura amajana n'amajana, bamwe biga muri za kaminuza, zaba izo mu gihugu canke hanze, abandi nabo bakaba bakibandanya amashure mato n'ayisumbuye. "Ico babigiriye ntaco nzi, gusa barashimye, kandi iyo bashimye uvyakira uko. Jewe rero ni agashimwe kiyongera ku bundi, kuko n'umukuru w'igihugu yarampaye agashimwe mu 2012", niko Ntahe avuga. Ku bw'iwe, ivyo akora abikora nk'umuvyeyi arera abana biwe neza, hanyuma bakaramurwa. Ati: "Ubundi nta muntu yategerezwa gushimirwa ariko arakora ico yategerezwa gukora, kuko nico Imana ituremera kw'isi, kugira umuntu afashe aho ari mu vyo ashobora. "Mu mutima jewe nta kintu kinini nabona nkora co gushimirwa kuko mbona umengo hari vyinshi ntarakora. "Ariko gusa ibi vyerekana ko ivyo nkora bishimwa n'ababibona, mu kuvyerekana bakabicisha muri utu dushimwe n'imfashanyo nkenke baza barafashisha". Christine Ntahe avuga ko ata wundi mugambi afise uretse kubandanya afasha aba bana bo mw'ibarabara kuko babandanya biyongera. Ati: "Jewe umugambi ni uwo kubandanya ndabakurikirana, nongera ndabafasha kugira ngo bashike ku ndoto zabo. Ati: "Usanga abenshi ubabajije bavuga ko bashaka kwiga kugira ngo bazotere imbere. Bafise indoto, nanje indoto zanje ni ugushikana abo bana ku ndoto zabo". Uretse abo yafashije i Bujumbura, ubu baharurwa mu majana ane, hari abandi bo muri komine Mutambu y'intara ya Bujumbura bashika ku 600 yafashije kubera iyo komine yabaye ikiririmbiro ry'intambara. Christine Ntahe avuga ko ibibazo agira muri iki gikorwa ari vyinshi cane, cane cane bishingiye ku buryo, mu gihe "abana bo mw'ibarabara bakenera vyinshi kandi babandanya biyongera". Ati: "Abo bana baguma biyongera, ivyo kubafungurira ntibikwira, abana ugasanga barwara nkabura uburyo bwo kubavuza, ibi vyose ni ingorane zikomeye mu gihe ari jewe jenyene nibako". Christine Ntahe arashima ingene reta yitayeho ikibazo c'abana bo mw'ibarabara, ariko akavuga ko hari ingorane nyinshi. Hamaze kugeragezwa kenshi kuvana abo bana mw'ibarabara na cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, umwe wese akajanwa iyo akomoka kugira yitabweho n'abo aho avuka canke ubutegetsi bw'aho. Madame Ntahe yemeza ko hari ibintu bitagenze neza kuko "abenshi muri bo baca bagaruka". Ati: "Ntibaba bateguwe bikwiye, na cane cane abavyeyi babo, kuko abana bamaze umwanya munini mw'ibarabara, biragoye kubumvisha ko bosubira mu miryango yabo". Christine Ntahe avuga ko ingorane nyamukuru ari uko hari abavyeyi barungika abana babo mw'ibarabara. Ati: "Hari umwana akubarira ati 'jewe ntaronse ibihumbi bitatu ku musi sintaha, mama ntankundira'. Ibaze rero abavyeyi baguma muhira bakarindira ko abana babo baja mw'ibarabara kubaronderera ibibabeshaho". Mu gihe hari abagiriza reta n'amashirahamwe yitaho agateka k'abana ko ikibazo cabananiye, umupfasoni Ntahe wewe yagiriza abavyeyi ko ari bo ntambamyi nyamukuru mu twigoro two kubakura mw'ibarabara. Ati: "Ni ukuri reta n'amashirahamwe bakora uko bashoboye ariko rero abavyeyi nabo ni intambamyi". Umupfasoni Ntahe arashima ibikorwa n'abajejwe agateka k'abana ariko agasaba reta gukora uko ishoboye igahimiriza abavyeyi bagakurikirana abana babo. Ati: "Abatishoboye rwose reta ikabafasha, ibahimirize kugira baje mu mashirahamwe kugira ngo bashobore gufasha abana babo". Atera akamo amashirahamwe afasha abana gushira hamwe inguvu kugira ngo bashobore gufasha aba bana. Asaba reta ko yohimiriza abatware ku nzego zo hasi gukurikirana abana babo, bakamenya iyo buri mwana ari.

column2: Ronaldo ntazokurikiranwa ku caha co "gufata ku nguvu"
column3: Rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru, Cristiano Ronaldo, ntazokurikiranwa nyuma yo kwagirizwa guhohotera bifatiye ku gitsina, nk'uko bitangazwa n'abashinjacaha muri Amerika. Kathryn Mayorga w'imyaka 34, yari yavuze ko uwo mukinyi wa Juventus yamusambanije ku nguvu mw'ihoteri i Las Vegas mu 2009. Bivugwa ko yashitse ku mwumvikano udaciye muri sentare n'uwo rurangiranwa wo muri Portugal mu 2010, ariko asaba ko urubanza rwosubira kwugururwa mu 2018. Ronaldo ahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Mu rwandiko rwasohowe kuwa mbere, abashinjacaha b'i Las Vegas bavuze ko ivyo uwo mugore avuga "bidashobora kwemezwa ata gukekeranya." Umwanditsi wa sentare yavuze ko uwo arega yavuze ko yahotewe mu 2009, ariko yanka kuvuga aho vyabereye canke uwamuhohoteye uwo ari we. Ngo ku bw'izo mvo rero igipolisi nticashoboye "gukora itohoza iryo ari ryo ryose ryogira ishingiro." Mu kwezi kw'umunani 2018, igipolisi c'i Las Vegas cakoze irindi tohoza bisabwe n'uwo avuga ko yahohotewe. Igitangazamakuru co mu Budage, Der Spiegel, nico catangaje ubwa mbere iyo nkuru mu mwaka uheze. Cavuze ko mu 2010 uwo mugore yashitse ku mwumvikano bidaciye muri sentare na Ronaldo, aho yahawe amahera $375,000, yemera ko atazokwigera avuga ivyo vyagiriji ku mugaragaro. Uwunganira Madamu Mayorga mu vy'amategeko yavuze ko yahawe ingoga zo kuvyutsa uru rubanda n'isekeza rya #MeToo, rirwanya ihohoterwa ry'abagore. Ronaldo ntiyahakanye ko yahuye n'uwo mugore i Las Vegas mu 2009, ariko avuga ko ivyabaye hagati yabo vyari ku gushaka kwa bose. Ico gihe Ronaldo yari agikinira Manchester United, agomba aje muri Real Madrid, aho yamaze imyaka icenda yakurikiye.

column2: USA: Prezida Donald Trump na NFL ntibumvikana mu kwiyamiriza ivanguramoko
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru wa Amerika, National Football League, NFL,  rivuga ko abakinyi bakwiye guhabwa uburenganzira bwo kwerekana akababaro kabo mu gihe c'ururirimbo rw'igihugu, ni mu gihe imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ivanguramoko ibandanya. Roger Goodell arongoye iryo shirahamwe, avuga ati: "Kumbe twarihenze kubona twararwanije abakinyi ba NFL ntitunahimirize abantu kwiyamiriza ivanguramoko". Imbere y'aha, iryo shirahamwe NFL ryarihanije abakinyi gusubira gupfukama mu gihe ururirimbo rw'igihugu ruriko rurasamirana, umugirwa wari watangujwe n'umukinyi Colin Kaepernick mu 2016. Uno munsi ku wa gatandatu, hitezwe imyiyerekano rukokoma mu gisagara ca Washington DC. Iyo myiyerekano iri mu rukurikirane rw'iyindi imaze iminsi mu gihugu cose yo kwiyamiriza igikenye n'amacakubiri vy'igipolisi, inyuma y'urupfu rwa George Floyd mu gisagara ca Minneapolis ku wa 25 z'ukwa gatanu guheze. Floyd, umwirabure yari yatewe amapingu, ata kirwanisho anafise, yarapfuye bivuye ku mupolisi yamusinzikarije ubuzima, aho yamupfukamye kw'izosi mu kiringo c'iminota hafi icenda. Uyo mupolisi yaragirijwe ubwicanyi mu gihe abandi bagenziwe batatu bagirijwe kumufasha icaha no gukokeza. Ejo ku wa gatanu, abategetsi ba Minneapolis bamenyesheje ko igipolisi kigiye kwihanizwa gusubira gufata umuntu mu kanigo, eka n'intara ya California nayo nyene ivuga ko igiye gufata iyo ngingo. Mw'ireresi yasohoye, Bwana Goodell yariyamirije ivanguramoko muri Amerika, inyuma y'aho abakinyi batari bake basabiye ishirahamwe NFL gufata ingingo ruhasha zo kwiyamiriza amacakubiri n'igikenye c'igipolisi mu gihugu. Ati: "Twebwe, Ishirahamwe ry'Umupira w'Amaguru, turemera ko ubuzima bw'umwirabure butegerezwa kwuhabihirwa. "Imyiyerekano iri mu gihugu yerekana imyaka ibinjana abakinyi, abafasha, abakunzi hamwe n'abakozi b'abirabure bamaze bahohoterwa kandi barenganywa kakaba akamizwe n'ingoma". "Ngiye kwama mbonana n'abakinyi biyamirije iyo ngendo hamwe n'abandi kugira ngo turabe ingene ibintu vyogenda neza". Perezida Donald Trump wewe siko avyumva, aho yiyamiriza bikomeye umugenzo wo gupfukama mu gihe ururirimbo rw'igihugu ruriko ruraririmbwa, mbere n'ejo ku wa gatanu akaba yarasubiye kwiyamiriza imyiyerekano nk'iyo. Aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, yanditse ati: "Ni ngombwa ko duhagarara neza kandi tukagororoka, bibaye ngombwa tukaramutsa canke tukifata ku mutima.  Hariho ivyo dushobora kwiyamiriza, ariko atari ibendera rikomeye rya Amerika". Yarananeguye n'umufasha w'umurwi New Orleans Saints mu vyo ubuhinga, Drew Brees, yirengagije akamo kiwe ko kubuza ivyo gupfukama mu gihe ururirimbo rw'igihugu ruriko rurasamirana. Uyu nawe ntiyavyihanganiye, aho yamwishuye ati: "Ni tureke kuba tuvuga ivy'ibendera twiyibagiza ibibazo nyavyo vy'akarenganyo n'ihohotera bishingiye ku rukoba, ubugome bw'igipolisi hamwe no gutunganya gushasha ibijanye n'ubutungane be n'amabohero". Ejo ku wa gatanu, ubutegetsi bwa Minneapolis hamwe n'igisata kijejwe kwubahiriza agateka ka muntu mu ntara ya Minnesota, barumvikanye kwihaniza igipolisi gusubira gufata mu kanigo abantu". Iyo ngingo nshasha, itegeka umupolisi uwo ari we wese, ata kuraba ipete afise, gutabariza mbere no gutabara, mu gihe azoba abonye mugenziwe asubiriye gukora ikintu nk'ico. Nayo umu democrate Gavin Newsom, buramatari  w'intara ya California, avuga ko agiye kubuza imyimenyerezo y'igipolisi yo gufata umuntu mu kanigo. Ibintu ntivyoroshe rero muri Amerika inyuma y'urupfu rw'umwirabure George Floyd rwatumye igihugu cose kirangwamwo imyiyerekano. Umucamanza w'igihugu mu gisagara ca Denver yategetse igipolisi kudasubira gutera abari mu myiyerekano vya vyuka bikoroza amosozi, amasasu ya plastiki eka n'ibindi birwanisho bitica ariko bibabaza. Iryo tegeko ryaje inyuma y'aho bane mu bari muri iyo myiyerekano bitwariye igipolisi ku gukoresha igikenye.

column2: Madagascar: Abantu 'barya ivu rivanze n'icamwa c'ishamba' kubera uruzuba
column3: Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya AFP rivuga ko abantu bo mu bumanuko bwa Madagascar bariko bararya ivu rivanze n'icamwa co mw'ishamba (cizwi nka tamarind) mu kwivuna inzara, mu gihe uruzuba rwononye ibiterwa mbumbarugo muri ako karere. AFP isubiramwo amajambo y'umurimyi Doday Fandilava Noelisona agira iti: "Turyita ivu [igitaka mu Kinyarwanda] ry'ubukiriro kuko rifasha mu kumira ico camwa ca 'Tamarind' kirura, mu kwivuna inzara." "Muri iyi minsi ntiturondera imfungurwa zo kutubeshaho, ahubwo turondera uburyo bwo kuzuza umushishito ugaragara [urimo ubusa]." 'Cactus', ibindi vyamwa vyo mw'ishamba abantu bari basanzwe bikorako, na vyo vyarumye kubera ibura ry'imvura. AFP irasubiramwo amajambo y'uwundi murimyi, Avianay Idamy, yavuze ko yatanguye kudandaza amakara kugira aronke amahera akwiye yotuma umuryango wiwe ushobora kurya umutsima rimwe ku munsi. Ishami rya ONU rijejwe imfungurwa kw'isi (PAM/WFP) rivuga ko abantu umuliyoni n'igice  bo mu karere ko mu bumanuko bwa Madagascar bakeneye imfashanyo y'ibifungurwa vyihuta. Si ubwa mbere ako karere gaterwa n'uruzuba nk'urwo. Mu 2016, ONU yamenyesheje ko abantu bababa umuliyoni n'igice bo mu bumanuko bwa Madagascar bageramiwe na kigoyi kubera uruzuba rwinshi rwatewe n'ihindagurika ry'ibihe hamwe n'iciswe 'El Nino'. ONU ikaba yavuze ko umwimbu w'ibigori wagabanutse ku bice mirongo umunani kw'ijana muri uwo mwaka, ibindi biterwa mbumbarugo birimwo nk'imyumbati bikaba bitapfa kuboneka. Icegeranyo ca ONU cagira kiti: "Abantu bariko barikora ku mbuto, kugurisha ivyo batunze hamwe n'ibikoresho bakoresha mu burimyi eka mbere n'ibiribwa vyo mw'ishamba."

column2: Malawi - Covid-19: Incanco 19.610 za AstraZeneca zataye igihe zaturiwe
column3: Malawi yaturiye incanco 19.610 zataye igihe za AstraZeneca, kikaba kibaye igihugu ca mbere ca Afrika gikoze ivyo. Cakurikije impanuro z'ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe kugenzura ingwara 'Africa Centres for Disease Control' (Africa CDC) cemeje ko incanco zarengeje ikiringo ziba zitagikora. Bavuga ko izo ncanco zarengeje ikiringo kandi ko atacerekana na kimwe ko zobandanya gukoreshwa, hishimikijwe ingingo ngenderwako z'ishami rya Onu rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi WHO/OMS. Kibaye igihugu ca mbere ca Afrika gitaye izo ncanco zataye igihe ku mugaragaro. Abategetsi bavuga ko iyo ngingo igamije gutanga icizere kubanye Malawi kugira bazoze guhabwa incanco igihe zizoba zibonetse. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Gushika ubu, igitigiri c'abicandagisha Covid-19 kiri hasi cane, cane cane bivanye n'ibihuha bivugwa kuri izo ncanco. Abategetsi batinya ko gukoresha incanco zataye igihe vyotuma abantu babatakariza icizere. Reta ya Malawi ifise icizere ko ukwicandagisha kuzokwongerekana igihe bazoronka izindi ncanco z'umugambi wa Covax. Abanye Malawi barenga 330.000 baricandagishije.

column2: Namibia: Abashingamateka bariyamiriza amasezerano ajanye n’ihonyabwoko ryakozwe na Germany
column3: Abashingamateka batavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi muri Namibia bariyamiriza reta ku mwumvikano uherutse kuba n'Ubudagi, igihugu catwaye Namibia mu gihe c'ubukoloni. Aya masezerano yatumye Ubudagi bwemera ko bwakoreye ihonyabwoko amoko y'aba Herero n'aba Nama, buca bwemera kuzoriha imiriyaridi 1.1 y'ama euro nk'indishi y'akababaro. Mw'ikoraniro ry'inama nshingamateka ry'ejo ku wa kabiri ryaranzwe n'induru nyinshi, umushingamateka wo ku ruhande rw'abatavuga rumwe yavuze ko ata mahirwe baronse yo kwerekana ingaruka mbi cane iri honyabwoko ryabateye rikabata mu bukene butagira izina. Uwundi nawe yavuze ko aba Herero n'aba Nama bakwiye kwiyamiriza aya masezerano abona ko ari ay'agasuzuguro. Umushikiranganji wa mbere, Saara Kuugongelwa-Amadhila, avuga ko ikintu nyamukuru ari uko abanya Namibia babandanya bafatanye mu nda. Mu ndwi iheze, icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yavuze ko ayo mafaranga Ubudagi bwemeye gutanga adakwiye, ariko ko ikibazo kizosubira kwigwa. Hagati ya 1904-1908, ingabo z'abakoloni b'Abadagi baragandaguye ibice birenga 80% vy'abanya Namibia bo mu bwoko bw'aba Herero n'aba Nama. Abahinga mu bijanye na kahise bafata aya mabi y'agahomerabunwa nk' "ihonyabwoko ryibagiwe" ryakozwe mu ntango z'ikinjana ca 20, muri ico gihugu citwa Intara y'Ubudagi mu Bumanuko bushira Uburengero bwa Afrika (German South West Africa/ Afrique allemand du Sud-Ouest). Mu kwezi guheze, Ubudagi bwasavye imbabazi kuri iri honyabwoko ryakozwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni inyuma y'ibiganiro - ikintu cari kirindiriwe imyaka n'imyaka, kandi kikaba ari co gihugu ca mbere gisavye imbabazi ku mabi nk'aya yakozwe n'iyari reta yaco ya gikoloni.

column2: Burundi: Abasenyeri gatolika bavuga ko utunenge mu matora bakibaza niba ivyayavuyemwo vyizigirwa
column3: Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi b'I Burundi (CECAB) ivuga ko amatora aheruka yo ku wa 20 z'uku kwa gatanu yaranzwe n'utungenge twinshi twatumye ivyayavuyemwo bibaza niba ari ivyo kwizigira. Mw'itangazo baraye basohoye kuri uyu wa 26/5, abepiskopi 'i Burundi bamenyesha ko barungitse indorerezi 2,716 mu makomine yose, zigashobora kuja ku tuzu tw'amatora batoye. Evariste Ndayishimiye niwe yatangajwe ku vy'agateganyo n'umurwi CENI ujejwe amatora ko yatsinze ayo matora n'amajwi 68%, Agathon Rwasa akaza ubwa kabiri n'amajwi 24%. Umugambwe CNL wa Agathon Rwasa be nawe ubwiwe, ntibemera ivyayavuyemwo. Uwutemera ivyatangajwe na CENI afise umunsi ntarengwa w'uyu munsi ku wa gatatu ngo yiture sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro. Mw'iryo tangazo, abasenyeri bavuga ko muri rusangi amatora yabaye mw'ituze, ariko y'uko hari utunenge twinshi dushingiye kw'ihonyangwa ry'ubwigenge, ukudafata kumwe abitoza n'abatora. Utunenge abo basenyeri bashira ahabona twashoboye kubonwa n'izo ndorerezi zabo aho zashoboye gushika ni utu: "Igitsure catewe bamwe mu baserukiye abitoza ngo batere igikumu ku mpapuro z'ivyegeranyo vy'ivyavuye mu matora imbere y'uko baharura"; "Amasandugu amwe amwe yashizwemo amakarata y'amajwi arenze (bourrage des urnes)"; "Abatoreye abantu bapfuye be n'impunzi"; "Abantu wasanga bafise amakete yo gutorera abandi menshi, ivyo navyo bitemewe". "Mu tuzu tw'amatora tumwe tumwe hari abantu batoye incuro zirenga imwe". "Hari abaserukiye abitoza be n'indorerezi birukanywe mu guharura amajwi". "Hari bamwe mu batora bakorewe iterabwoba baterwa n'igitsure na bamwe mu bategetsi banabaherekeza no mu bwiherero". "Abantu batemewe n'amategeko biyadukiza bakinjira mu bibanza vyo guharuriramwo amajwi". "Gutora mw'ibanga bitubahirijwe". "Bamwe mu bahagarikizi baratswe impapuro zibaha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira amatora banakwa n'amaterefone yabo". Abo basenyeri gatorika mu Burundi babona ko utwo tunenge dutuma bibaza niba ivyari vyitezwe gutangazwa vyizigirwa. Babona kandi ko hari abariko barahohotera canke bashaka guturubika ababanyi babo inyuma y'aya matora, babahora ko badasangiye ivyiyumviro, bagasaba abategetsi guhana abo bantu. Bati: "Mu gihe amategeko yemera ko haba abahiganwa benshi, buri munyagihugu yari afise uburenganzira bwo kwerekana uwo yipfuza gushigikira". Abo basenyeri basaba ko uwumva ko yarenganijwe yokwirinda gukoresha imigumuko, agaca mu nziza y'ubutungane kugira ngo atunganirizwe. Mu matora atatu yabaye kuwa gatatu uheze, ihiganwa ryari rikomeye ryari hagati y'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi hamwe na CNL utavuga rumwe nawo. Imigambwe imwe n'abandi bitoje ku giti cabo ku mwanya w'umukuru w'igihugu baremeye ivyavuye mu matora n'ubwo banenze utunenge tumwe tumwe twibonekeje. Hagati aho, umugambwe CNL uvuga ko amatora yabayemwo ubusuma, ukavuga ko washoboye kwegeranya ivyegeranyo vy'amatora vyerekana ko ari wo wayatsinze. Domitien Ndayizeye witoza ashizwe imbere n'urunani Kira Burundi, yabwiye BBC utunenge yabonye twabaye mu matora, ariko avuga ko "igihe uwatowe azoba amaze kwemezwa na CENI ubwa nyuma nta kizomubuza gutwara Uburundi". Umugwi CENI ujejwe gutegura amatora wowo wemeza ko amatora yagenze neza. Sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro utegerezwa kumenyesha ibiharuro ntabanduka vyayavuyemwo ku wa 04 z'ukwa gatandatu.

column2: Umunsi wahariwe abagore: Mu Burundi ngo baraciye akenge ko kwishira hamwe
column3: Mu gihe isi yaraye ihimbaje umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe guharanira uburenganzira bw'abakenyezi n'iterambere ryabo, muri iyi ndwi turacihweza aho isemo igeze kuri iki kibazo c'uburinganire ku burenganzira hagati y'abagabo n'abagore. Mu Burundi, abagore ngo baramaze guca akenge ko kwishira hamwe mu migwi yo gukorera hamwe, bikabatuma kuronka umutahe no kugwiza umwimbu n'ubwo ibibazo bitabuze. Kimwe mu bibazo nyamukuru bisigaye ni ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina, aho mu ntara zigera kuri 19, harangwa ibigo bitatu gusa bishobora kwakira no gufasha mu buryo bwa mbere abakorewe ayo mabi. Ariko rero ngo ibintu biriko birahinduka mu nzira nziza. Ivyo Florentine Kwizera yabibwiwe n'uwujejwe umugambi w'iterambere ridakumira mw'ishirahamwe ACORD Burundi, Mme Sophie Havyarimana (umviriza ikiganiro aho hejuru ukanze kw'ifoto)

column2: Papa Francis: Gatolika yakoze amakosa mu "gucinyiza imico y'abandi"
column3: Umwungere wa Elkeziya Gatolika, Papa Francis, yavuze ko iryo shengero ryakoze amakosa mu gushimikira ku muco umwe gusa, rimwe na rimwe hakanakoreshwa inguvu mu gushika ku mugambi waryo Papa yavuze yuko ivyo vyahombeje Ishengero ubutunzi butandukanye bwo mu mico n'imigenzo myinshi. Yavuze yuko inyigisho z'ishengero zerekanye yuko hakwiye kwubahirizwa "inkomoko y'umuco n'akaranga vya buri muntu." Ivyo Papa Francis yabivugiye mu mubonano rusangi uba buri wa gatati i Vaticano. Abivuze mu gihe hari umwidogo ku mugabane wa Amerika y'ubumanuko ku vyagizwe igihe Espagne yigarurira ico gice c'isi ikanashira mu bukoroni ba kavukire baho. Kuwa kabiri umukuru w'igisagara ca Mexico mu gihugu ca Mexique yavuze yuko igishusho c'umugore kavukire kizosubirira ica Christopher Columbus (afatwa nk'uwatoye aho umugabane wa Amerika uri) muri kimwe mu bice bikomeye vy'uwo muji.

column2: Bazamuganga: Uburwayi bwa Fibromes Uterins bumeze gute?
column3: Abagore n'abigeme bageze mu myaka yo kwibaruka barashobora  kugira ikibazo c'ibivyimba mu bice vy'igitereko/ Fibromes Uterins Ibi bivyimba bikunda kuboneka ku birabure gusumba ayandi moko (mu bazungukazi bifata abagera ku bice 20% nayo mu birabure barenga 50%). Ni ingwara kuri bamwe itera ububabare bukomeye cane, n'aho ata vyinshi bivugwa ku bushakashatsi bwo kumenya impamvu zavyo n'ingene vyokwirindwa. Forentine Kwizera avugana na Muganga Thierry Mako, yanonosoye gukwirikirana abavyeyi (Gyneco-obstetricien), atangura amubaza uburyo ivyo bivyimba bimenyekana ku wubifise (umviriza ikiganiro aho hejuru).

column2: Eto'o ashaka 'gusubiriza Afrika mu ndumane' yifashishije amashure
column3: Icamamare c'umunyafrika mu mupira w'amaguru Samuel Eto'o avuga ko ashaka gukoresha ubumenyi azokura mu cigwa c'ubutunzi muri  Kaminuza ya Havard muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, mu gusubiriza mu ndumane umugabane wa Afrika. Uyo yatsindiye incuro 4 agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza wo ku mugabane wa Afrika gatangwa buri mwaka  yamenyesheje ko agiye mu zabukuru mu mupira w'amaguru afise imyaka 38 mu kwezi kwa 9. Eto'o yizera ko kujabuka ibahari Atlantique aja muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kwiga ibijanye n'ubutunzi bizofasha intumbero yiwe yo gufasha umugabane wa Afrika. Eto yabwiye ikinyamakuru co mu Bufaransa, Jeune Afrique, candikirwa kuri Internet ati: "Ngomba gufasha no gutanga intererano nziza mu guhindura umugabane wacu". ''Iyo uri umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru urariha amafranga abantu kugira bagufashe mu kazi kawe n'ibindi vya nkenerwa muri rusange." ''Ariko iyo ari wewe utegerezwa gutunganya akazi abantu bakora, kandi ukaba ushaka kubateza imbere, utegerezwa kwiga ubundi ubumenyi bushasha." Uyo yahoze ari umukinyi w'imbere w'igihugu ca Cameroun n'ikipe ya Barcelona, akaba kandi ari we yinjirije igihugu ciwe ibitsindo vyinshi, bishika 56 mu nkino 118, yaremanze ingingo yiwe yo kwiga ubuzima bwiwe bwose niyahagarika gukina umupira w'amaguru. Yasiguye ati: ''Mu kwezi kwa mbere nzotangura ivyigwa vyo gutunganya ibijanye n'ubutunzi muri Kaminuza ya Havard inyuma y'aho iyo Kaminuza ingiriye neza ikanyemerera  inyigisho z'umwihariko''. "Nzoba mba mu gisagara ca Boston mu kiringo kingana hafi umwaka. Ntibizoba vyoroshe, ariko ni ibitoroshe binezereye, mukaba musanzwe muzi ko jewe nkunda cane ibimbiza akuya". Eto'o yatsindiye ibikombe vyinshi mu gukina kwiwe muri Espagne no mu Butaliyano, ariko aho yabiciye bigacika ku rwego rw'amakipe ni muri Barcelona aho yakinye kuva mu 2004 gushika mu 2009. Mu bikombe yaronse muri iyo kipe harimwo 3 vyo mw'ihiganwa La Liga na bibiri vya Champions League. Yaratsindiye kandi Champions League amenyerezwa na Jose Mourinho muri Inter Milan mu 2010, akaba kandi afise umudari w'inzahabu mw'ihiganwa Olempike ku rwego rw'ikipe y'igihugu ca Cameroun mu 2000. Eto'o mu mwuga wiwe yakinye kandi mu bihugu nka Turkiya, Uburusiya hamwe na Qatar, akaba kandi ari nawe amaze kwinjiriza ibitsindo vyinshi mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika, akaba afise ibitsindo 18. Yakinye mu mahiganwa ane y'igikombe c'isi aserukiye ikipe ya Cameroun izwi nka "Les Lions Indomptables" mu 1998, 2002, 2010 no mu  2014 aho yakinye incuro 8 akinjiza ibitsindo 3. Uyo musatirizi kandi yanatsindiye ibikombe vya Afrika bibiri yikurikiranya akinira igihugu ciwe, mu 2000 n'i 2002.

column2: Abaguzi b'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi mu Burundi basaba guhumurizwa
column3: Nyuma y'aho leta ivugiye ko atacatitutse mu buryo ishirahamwe Brarudi rihingura ibinyobwa vyaryo, ababifata amakenga ntarahera kuko akanovera katakiri kakandi. Ikigo ca leta y'u Burundi kijejwe kugenzura ubuziranenge bw'ibidandazwa, BBN giheruka kumenyesha ko naho akanovera k'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi koba katakiri nka mbere, ngo ntacatitutse ku buryo bihingurwa. Ariko abafata ivyo binyobwa ntibashize amakenga, imyidogo ikaba ikiri ya yindi mu gihe bobo bafashe ivyo binyobwa bumva neza ko "bitakiryoshe" nka mbere. Haca rero haza umwitwarariko wo kumenya niba ivyo binyobwa bisa n'ivyahindutse ata ngaruka vyobagirako naho leta isa n'iyihumuriza. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'abaguzi mu Burundi, Pierre Nduwayo, yabwiye BBC ko vyumvikanye ko ivyo binyobwa bifise icahindutse. Yagize ati: "Biboneka mu nzoga, twaratanguye kuvyumva cane cane nko muri za Royale (Amstel), hamwe n'amafana. "Ivyo n'imbere y'uko umushikiranganji abishikiriza imyidogo y'abaguzi twari tumaze kuyumva. Kandi na twebwe ubisomye urumva ko akanovera kahahora gasa n'akahindutse." Bwana Nduwayo yabandanije avuga ko Brarudi mu bisanzwe yahora inyaruka mu gushikiriza ibijanye n'ibinyobwa vyayo ariko ko ubu ataco iravuga. Yagize ati: "Brarudi twari dusazanzwe tuzi ko ari ishirahmwe rikunda kuza riramenyesha ibintu vyabo aho bihagaze n'ubwo hoba hari ingorane bakazishikiriza. "Ariko kuva iyo myidogo itanguye bari mu gacerere ntangere, ni naco gituma twovuga duti ahubwo nibave muri ako gacerere  bashikirize nabo kuri ayo magenga abaguzi boba bafise..." Uwo aserukiye abaguzi yabandanije avuga ko naho leta ivuga ko ata ngorane zihara, akanovera gafise akamaro kanini mu gutuma abaguzi bahurumbira ikidandazwa ico ari co cose. Rero ngo naho boba bababwira ko ata ngorane kandi bumva ako kanovera karahindutse, ntibibuza ko bagira amakenga.

column2: Ibanki nkuru y’u Burundi igabisha amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga atisunze amategeko
column3: Umuyobozi w'igisata kijejwe kugenzura amabanki mw'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu c'u Burundi, Prosper Ngendanganya, asaba amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga kwubahiriza amategeko yashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu. Ni inyuma y'umubonano hagati y'iyo banki n'amashirahamwe agura akagurisha amafaranga wabaye  ku munsi wa kane w'iyi ndwi mu ntumbero y'ukwibutsa ayo mashirahamwe amategeko mashasha n'igituma adakurikizwa. Ku wa 17 z'ukwezi kw'icenda uno mwaka, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Mw'itangazo yasohoye ejo ku wa gatanu, bwana Ngendakumana yaragabishije ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Avuga ko ishirahamwe rizofatwa ririko riragurisha ibiciro ry'ishakiye ko rizofatwa nk'umwansi w'igihugu kandi ko rizohanwa hisunzwe igatabu mpanavyaha. Ibanki nkuru y'igihugu imenyesha kandi ko urudandazwa rutemewe n'amategeko (marché noir) rw'amafaranga y'agaciro rwasubiye kwibonekeza cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. BRB ikababazwa n'uko ayo mashirahamwe adashaka gufasha mu kwerekana abo badandaza bo mu kinyegero bakora batubahiriza ibiciro biba vyashinzwe na BRB. Mu rugamba rwo kurwanya urudandazwa ruteye kubiri n'amategeko, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu yaremereye agashirukabute umuntu azoshobora kwerekana ishirahamwe canke inzu izogura canke izogurisha amafaranga y'agaciro hatisunzwe iryo tegeko rishasha, aho azoronswa ibihumbi 500 vy'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ni mu gihe uwuzokwerekana umuntu canke ishirahamwe rikora ritazwi n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu nawe azorosnwa ibice 10 kw'ijana (10%) vy'amafaranga yose azoba afashwe. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kani amafaranga y'agaciro akena.
